did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Carta apologetica al Padre José Utrera de la Compañia de Jesús, Visitador General de las misiones de la Provincia de la Nueva España escrita por el Padre Tomás Miranda, Visitador de Cumuripa en la Provincia de Sonora, a 18 de Febrero de 1755. February 18, 1775
did.abstract: Hologram of a letter to Father José Utrera apologetics of the Society of Jesus, Inspector General of the missions of the Province of New Spain written by Father Thomas Miranda, Cumuripa Visitor of the Province of Sonora, to February 18, 1755.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restsrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Carta apologetica al Padre José Utrera de la Compañia de Jesús, Visitador General de las misiones de la Provincia de la Nueva España escrita por el Padre Tomás Miranda, Visitador de Cumuripa en la Provincia de Sonora, a 18 de Febrero de 1755 (MS 184). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Mission San Pedro de Cumuripa was located in the Pima Baja region of northern Mexico. Miranda was Jesuit Visitador to the Mission in 1755 and 1756.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: One bound holograph letter to Father José Utrera apologetics of the Society of Jesus, Inspector General of the missions of the Province of New Spain written by Father Thomas Miranda, Cumuripa Visitor of the Province of Sonora, to February 18, 1755.
